utilities

Class PatrolListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.PatrolListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    city.cs.engine.StepListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class PatrolListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements city.cs.engine.StepListener
    A step listener dedicated to controlling the patrolling behavior of an Enemy object. It invokes the patrol method of the enemy at each simulation step before any collision response is calculated. This ensures that the enemy's patrolling logic is consistently evaluated, allowing for movement and boundary checks in the game world.
    Since:
    1.0

        public void preStep(city.cs.engine.StepEvent e)
